package.name: automake113
package.build: cd automake-${PKGVERSION} jobcount=2 if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then DISTCC_HOSTS="$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" export DISTCC_HOSTS jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" fi ./configure --prefix=/usr/local/automake113 && make -j $jobcount
package.install: cd automake-${PKGVERSION} make install DESTDIR=${TGTDIR} mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin ln -sf /usr/local/automake113/bin/automake ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/automake-1.13 cd .. mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/local/automake113/share/aclocal-1.13 install -m 0644 pkg-config-0.28/aclocal.m4 ${TGTDIR}/usr/local/automake113/share/aclocal-1.13 install -m 0644 pkg-config-0.28/pkg.m4 ${TGTDIR}/usr/local/automake113/share/aclocal-1.13
